title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Critical and Creative Learning Design Workshop for Scientific Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design research using critical thinking tools to solve real-world scientific problems.
Learners can establish an implementation plan for PBL projects by applying creative problem-solving methodologies.
Learners can develop their research identity through peer feedback and propose solutions reflecting social contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
